feature.label: Prototyping Feature
feature.description: The prototyping feature adds operators for rapid prototyping of new processing concepts. This includes a simple operator for user defined functions and the possibility to define aggregates (with its init, merge and evaluate steps) in other languages (like JavaScript or Ruby).
